mapper.select: select items.itemName,items.price,pic_item.picAddress from items,sold_items,pic_item where items.itemId=sold_items.itemId and pic_item.itemId=items.itemId and sold_items.clientId=#{clientId}
select items.itemName,items.price,pic_item.picAddress from items,bought_items,pic_item where items.itemId=sold_items.itemId and pic_item.itemId=items.itemId and bought_items.clientId=#{clientId}
